data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Jerome Brisard awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 2, Jerome Brisard awards Strasbourg a goal kick.
Ludovic Ajorque of Strasbourg smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Strasbourg.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Strasbourg in their own half.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Montpellier in their own half.
Throw-in for Strasbourg at Stade de la Mosson.
In the minute 7, Strasbourg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Montpellier in their own half.
Montpellier have been awarded a corner by Jerome Brisard.
In the minute 8, Pedro Mendes is on target to give Montpellier a 1-0 advantage.
Great play from Teji Savanier to set up the goal.
Jerome Brisard signals a Montpellier throw-in in Strasbourg's half.
In the minute 11, Montpellier's Andy Delort gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Strasbourg goal kick.
In Montpellier a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 13, Andy Delort scores with a header and the home team increase their lead to 2-0.
Junior Sambia with an assist there.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Strasbourg in the half of Montpellier.
Ball safe as Montpellier is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Montpellier have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 17, Strasbourg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Montpellier needs to be cautious. Strasbourg have an attacking throw-in.
An attacking Strasbourg player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
In the minute 22, Strasbourg are back in the match in Montpellier. A Kenny Lala penalty has made the score 2-1.
Throw-in Strasbourg.
Corner awarded to Montpellier.
In the minute 25, Strasbourg have been awarded a penalty in Montpellier...
Pedro Mendes is booked for the home team.
Goal! The away team is awarded a penalty in Montpellier. Habib Diallo converts to level the scoring at 2-2.
In the minute 29, Montpellier have been awarded a corner by Jerome Brisard.
Free kick Montpellier.
Free kick for Strasbourg in their own half.
In the minute 31, Montpellier awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! Andy Delort heads Montpellier into a 3-2 lead.
Mihailo Ristic instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 33, Florent Mollet for Montpellier drives towards goal at Stade de la Mosson. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Montpellier to take a throw-in in Strasbourg territory.
Montpellier have been awarded a corner by Jerome Brisard.
In the minute 35, Jerome Brisard signals a throw-in for Montpellier, close to Strasbourg's area.
Corner awarded to Montpellier.
Montpellier drive upfield and Andy Delort gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Strasbourg defender.
In the minute 37, Corner awarded to Montpellier.
Can Strasbourg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montpellier's half?
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Strasbourg in their own half.
In the minute 38, Jeanricner Bellegarde for Strasbourg gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Montpellier at Stade de la Mosson.
Montpellier have been awarded a corner by Jerome Brisard.
In the minute 39, Montpellier are pushing forward but Andy Delort's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Montpellier.
In Montpellier Strasbourg drive forward through Kenny Lala. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 41, Corner awarded to Montpellier.
Throw-in for Strasbourg at Stade de la Mosson.
Strasbourg to take a throw-in in Montpellier territory.
In the minute 43, Strasbourg's Habib Diallo attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Montpellier have a goal kick.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Strasbourg.
The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Montpellier in the half of Strasbourg.
In Montpellier Montpellier attack through Florent Mollet. The finish is off target, however.
Jerome Brisard awards Strasbourg a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Montpellier.
In the minute 45, Ludovic Ajorque is on target to level the scores at 3-3.
That's a fine assist from Kenny Lala.
The second-half has started.
Mihailo Ristic gets his shot on target but fails to score for Montpellier.
In the minute 47, Can Strasbourg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montpellier's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Strasbourg goal kick.
Can Montpellier capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 49, Jean-Eudes Aholou (Strasbourg) has received a first yellow card.
Montpellier's Junior Sambia gets in a shot on goal at Stade de la Mosson. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Montpellier have been awarded a corner by Jerome Brisard.
In the minute 50, Montpellier's Pedro Mendes is on target but unsuccessful.
Montpellier are coming forward and Andy Delort gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Strasbourg have a goal kick.
In the minute 52, It's a goal kick for the away team in Montpellier.
Goal kick for Strasbourg at Stade de la Mosson.
Free kick Strasbourg.
In the minute 54, At Stade de la Mosson, Daniel Congre has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Strasbourg's Habib Diallo gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Montpellier defender.
Montpellier awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 58, Free kick for Montpellier in their own half.
Free kick for Strasbourg in the half of Montpellier.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Montpellier in their own half.
In the minute 61, Jerome Brisard awards the away team a throw-in.
Strasbourg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Montpellier surge into the attack at Stade de la Mosson but Gaetan Laborde’s header is off-target.
In the minute 64, It's a goal kick for the away team in Montpellier.
In Montpellier a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Dimitri Lienard is replacing Jean-Eudes Aholou for Strasbourg at Stade de la Mosson.
In the minute 66, Strasbourg advance rapidly upfield but Jerome Brisard blows for offside.
Michel Der Zakarian is making the team's first substitution at Stade de la Mosson with Yun Il-Lok replacing Stephy Mavididi.
Throw-in for Strasbourg in their own half.
In the minute 68, Goal! Montpellier have got their heads in front thanks to a Gaetan Laborde strike.
Great play from Andy Delort to set up the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Montpellier goal kick.
In the minute 70, Strasbourg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Strasbourg.
Free kick for Montpellier in their own half.
In the minute 74, The away team have replaced Kenny Lala with Mehdi Chahiri. This is the second substitution made today by Thierry Laurey.
Montpellier's Gaetan Laborde misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Strasbourg at Stade de la Mosson.
In the minute 75, Florent Mollet gets his shot on target but fails to score for Montpellier.
Corner awarded to Montpellier.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Strasbourg in their own half.
In the minute 77, Jerome Brisard awards Montpellier a goal kick.
Free kick for Strasbourg in their own half.
Strasbourg pushes forward through Ludovic Ajorque, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 79, Strasbourg have been awarded a corner by Jerome Brisard.
Free kick for Montpellier in the half of Strasbourg.
Throw-in Strasbourg.
In the minute 80, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Montpellier attack but Yun Il-Lok's header doesn't find the target.
Strasbourg have a goal kick.
In the minute 82, Ball safe as Montpellier is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Keagan Dolly is replacing Florent Mollet for the home team.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Strasbourg.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Strasbourg in their own half.
Thierry Laurey (Strasbourg) is making a third substitution, with Lucien Kevin Zohi replacing Anthony Caci.
Thierry Laurey (Strasbourg) is making a fourth substitution, with Adrien Thomasson replacing Jeanricner Bellegarde.
In the minute 85, Ball goes out of play for a Strasbourg goal kick.
Corner awarded to Strasbourg.
Montpellier make their third substitution with Joris Chotard replacing Jordan Ferri.
Montpellier have been awarded a corner by Jerome Brisard.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Montpellier.
In the minute 89, Michel Der Zakarian is making the team's fourth substitution at Stade de la Mosson with Vitorino Hilton replacing Gaetan Laborde.
Throw-in for Strasbourg in the half of Montpellier.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Jerome Brisard awards Montpellier a goal kick.
Free kick Montpellier.
Throw-in high up the field for Strasbourg in Montpellier.
The second-half is over. The match ends 4-3.
